definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
lit. severe floods and fierce beasts (idiom)/fig. great scourges/extremely dangerous or threatening things
lit. scatter like birds and beasts (idiom)/fig. to head off in various directions/to flee helter-skelter
birds and animals/the beasts of the field and the birds of the air

sentences.english: One of the heads of the beast seemed to have had a fatal wound, but the fatal wound had been healed.
sentences.chinese: 它在头一个兽面前，施行头一个兽所有的权柄。

sentences.english: One of the heads of the beast seemed to have had a fatal wound, but the fatal wound had been healed.
sentences.chinese: 它在头一个兽面前，施行头一个兽所有的权柄。

sentences.english: The orc breaks Valeera's arm and throws her into the corner.
sentences.chinese: 兽人攀折了瓦蕾拉的手臂，并将其丢到了角落里。

sentences.english: The appearance of Apocalymon was recorded in a prophetic book from ancient times.
sentences.chinese: 太古的预言书记录下来了启示录兽的出现。

sentences.english: The llama was domesticated long ago as a beast of burden.
sentences.chinese: 很早以前，美洲骆驼就被驯服为役兽。

sentences.english: The wind takes the form of the beast, the Imperial Palace of Beijing Taihe temple has this monster.
sentences.chinese: 嘲风形似兽，北京故宫的太和殿里有这个怪兽。

sentences.english: An astral dreadnought does not speak or otherwise communicate.
sentences.chinese: 星界巨舰兽不会说话或者与人沟通。

sentences.english: The Brute looked about the bridge, blinked, and then glared at Fred.
sentences.chinese: 鬼面兽看着舰桥，眨着眼睛，然后怒视着弗雷德。

sentences.english: They conquered a wilderness full of mutant beasts to arrive at the top of their food chain.
sentences.chinese: 他们征服了变异兽肆虐的荒野，踏上食物链的顶端。

sentences.english: The Red Dragon gives life to the first of three beasts.
sentences.chinese: 那红龙给三个兽中的第一个兽生命。

sentences.english: The Red Dragon gives life to the first of three beasts.
sentences.chinese: 那红龙给三个兽中的第一个兽生命。

sentences.english: Like when the Siegebreaker bit the Barbarian in half during the gameplay demo .
sentences.chinese: 比如在演示视频中那个野蛮人被攻城兽撕成了两半。

sentences.english: Gus in his red jacket and patent-leather boots, whip in hand, stepped to the door of the cage.
sentences.chinese: 葛斯穿著红夹克，漆皮靴，手握长鞭，走到兽笼门前。

sentences.english: Arsinoitherium's most distinctive feature was the two large horns on their snouts .
sentences.chinese: 重脚兽最有特色的就是它嘴边的两个角。

sentences.english: Manis worse than an animal when he is an animal.
sentences.chinese: 当人是兽时，他比兽还坏。

sentences.english: In fact, he sympathized with one of the prisoners for killing the rancor beast.
sentences.chinese: 实际上，他很同情死囚中那位杀掉兰克兽的人。

definition: lower form of animal life, including insects, insect larvae, worms and similar creatures/CL:條|条[tiao2],隻|只[zhi1]/(fig.) person with a particular undesirable characteristic
a legendary dragon with the ability to control rain and floods/see also 蛟龍|蛟龙[jiao1 long2]
